requirements.summary: Ensure the frontend application is fully built and deployed with all existing features intact, including homepage hero, product showcase with INR prices, about section, contact section with real details, sticky navigation with logo, and bold athletic theme
acceptanceCriteria: The application deploys successfully without build or deployment errors
All sections (Hero, Products, About, Contact) are visible and functional on the live deployment
The Jay Sports logo image is displayed in the navigation bar
Product prices are shown in Indian Rupees (₹)
Contact section displays the correct address (196 - New Colony Ratnipora, Pulwama, 192304, Jammu and Kashmir), phone (+91 70069 81592), and email (jaysports.in@gmail.com)
The dark athletic theme with electric red accents is applied consistently across all sections

file_operations.description: Verify the Jay Sports logo image path references the generated logo at frontend/public/assets/generated/jay-sports-logo.dim_256x256.png and ensure the navigation bar renders correctly with sticky positioning and smooth scroll behavior

Verify the hero section uses the generated hero banner at frontend/public/assets/generated/hero-banner.dim_1440x600.png and ensure all page sections (Navigation, Hero, ProductShowcase, AboutSection, ContactSection) are properly composed and render in the correct order

Verify all product images reference the generated assets (frontend/public/assets/generated/product-jersey.dim_400x400.png, product-shorts.dim_400x400.png, product-hoodie.dim_400x400.png, product-shoes.dim_400x400.png, product-cap.dim_400x400.png, product-socks.dim_400x400.png) and ensure prices are displayed in Indian Rupees with the ₹ symbol

Verify the contact section displays the correct address (196 - New Colony Ratnipora, Pulwama, 192304, Jammu and Kashmir), phone (+91 70069 81592), and email (jaysports.in@gmail.com), and ensure the contact form validation and success state work properly
Verify the dark athletic theme with electric red accents is properly defined using CSS custom properties and ensure the Barlow font family imports are loading correctly
Verify the Tailwind configuration includes the dark athletic color palette using oklch values, custom fonts (Barlow/Barlow Condensed), and animation keyframes for the athletic theme
Verify the HTML shell includes the correct page title (Jay Sports), meta tags for SEO, and the root div element where the React app mounts
